description: Patroni dashboard for pgSCV metrics (Prometheus version, pgSCV 0.9.7 edition)

panels.description: Epoch timestamp when DCS was last contacted successfully by Patroni.
panels.title: DCS last seen

panels.description: Is 1 if the replaying of Postgres transaction log is paused, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: Replay paused

panels.description:
Patroni pause or resume mode for the cluster.

See docs https://patroni.readthedocs.io/en/master/pause.html for more info.
panels.title: Pause/Resume mode

panels.description: Is 1 if Postgres is running, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: PostgreSQL running

panels.description:
Is 1 if synchronous mode is active, 0 if inactive.

See docs https://patroni.readthedocs.io/en/latest/replication_modes.html#synchronous-mode for more info.
panels.title: PostgreSQL synchronous standby

panels.description: Is 1 if the node needs a restart, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: PostgreSQL pending restart

panels.description: Is 1 if Postgres is streaming, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: PostgreSQL streaming

panels.description: Is 1 if Postgres is replicating from archive, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: PostgreSQL is archive recovery

panels.description: Current location of the Postgres transaction log, 0 if this node is a replica.
panels.title: Primary WAL location

panels.description: Current location of the received Postgres transaction log, 0 if this node is the leader.
panels.title: Replica received WAL location

panels.description: Current location of the replayed Postgres transaction log, 0 if this node is the leader.
panels.title: Replica replayed WAL location

title: Patroni
